NAMESPACE: The namespaces where the cluster is. Ex default
TERM: The term used by mariadb. Ex xterm
ROOT_PASSWORD: The root password for mariadb. Ex password
XTRABACKUP_PASSWORD: The password used by xtrabackup to synchronize for mariadb. Ex password
GLUSTERFS_PATH_LIST: The glusterfs path list. Ex mariadb_galera_volume_1, mariadb_galera_volume_2, mariadb_galera_volume_3
GLUSTERFS_ENDPOINTS: The endpoints used to forward to glusterfs server cluster. Ex glusterfs
